thread.title: MOMOLAND Is Gearing Up For A Comeback
thread.title_full: MOMOLAND Is Gearing Up For A Comeback

author: kiddy_days
title: MOMOLAND Is Gearing Up For A Comeback
text:
Good news; girl group MOMOLAND is preparing for an April comeback! 
According to their agency Duble Kick Company on March 27, “MOMOLAND is in the final stages of preparing for their album with the goal of a comeback at the end of next month. The exact date has not been decided yet.”   
One of the members, Yeonwoo, had previously halted activities due to worsening back pain . About this, the representative said, “We’re not sure yet whether she will be able to join the group for the comeback.” 
The talented girls debuted last year through the reality show program “Finding Momoland,” and made their debut with “JJan! Koong! Kwang!” last November.
